interface.description: Represents a video item (movie, TV, etc.)

field.name: URL
field.description: URL to the camera video stream.

field.name: Width
field.description: Width in pixels of the video.

field.name: Height
field.description: Height in pixels of the video.

field.name: Transport
field.description: Transport protocol used to transfer stream.

field.name: Container
field.description: Video Container Format used to encapsulate stream.

field.name: Video Stream
field.description: Video Stream Format used to transfer stream.

field.name: Audio Stream
field.description: Audio Stream Format used to transfer stream.

field.name: Language
field.description: IETF Language tag for the language of the audio.
